Detailed Description

NetworkList class provides an network based view.

Displays every network that is currently loaded in Aki.

Member Function Documentation

void NetworkList::addNetwork ( NetworkListItem *  network  ) 

Inserts the network at the end of the list.

Warning:
A NetworkListItem can only be added to a NetworkList once. Adding the same NetworkListItem multiple times to a NetworkList will result in undefined behaviour.
Parameters:
item Network item.
